# Captive Conventional Changelog _(@captive/conventional-changelog)_
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

[![NPM Version][package-version-svg]][package-url]
[![License][license-image]][license-url]

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (PKG_JSON:template=> ${description}&unknownTxt= ) -->
> Conventional changelog plugin for Captive projects
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

## Installation

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (PKG_JSON:template=```console\nnpm install --save-dev ${name}\n```) -->
```console
npm install --save-dev @captive/conventional-changelog
```
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

## Usage

### With Lerna

In `lerna.json` of your project

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (PKG_JSON:template=```json\n{\n   "changelogPreset": ["${name}"]\n}\n```) -->
```json
{
   "changelogPreset": ["@captive/conventional-changelog"]
}
```
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
